channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- Domino AppDev Pack
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- Domino AppDev Pack

item.title: CVE-2023-28015|2024-08-02T12:23:30.867Z -- hcl%20software -- domino%20appdev%20pack
item.description: The HCL Domino AppDev Pack IAM service is susceptible to a User Account Enumeration vulnerability. During a failed login attempt a difference in messages could allow an attacker to determine if the user is valid or not. The attacker could use this information to focus a brute force attack on valid users.
